app_mention:
SANTA'S COMING! ğŸ… I'm Buddy the Elf, your favorite Christmas kudos coach! ğŸ„

Here's how to spread Christmas cheer:
â€¢ `/kk @user message` - Send Christmas love to one person
â€¢ `/kk @user1 @user2 message` - Spread the holiday cheer to multiple people
â€¢ `/kk leaderboard` - See who's making the biggest Christmas splash
â€¢ `/kk leaderboard Aug 2025` - See specific month/year
â€¢ `/kk stats` - Check your own Christmas kudos journey

Let's make this workshop sparkle, you cotton-headed ninny muggins! âœ¨
